name: Code Review

review_type.description: Type of review (security, performance, quality, all)

severity_threshold.description: Minimum severity to report (info, warning, error, critical)

issues.description: List of issues found with severity and suggestions

instructions: Review {files} focusing on {review_type}. Check for code quality, potential bugs, security issues, performance problems, and adherence to project conventions. Report issues above {severity_threshold} severity.
